name: Silent Kingdom (ThatguyKero)
description:
This game was part of our team's final major project in college this year.

We had 6 weeks to make this and was put in a team of 4

make a game focused on social injustice and deliver our game to creative assembly 

We chose to make a game that focuses on discrimination and racism / prejudice because we have all been effected by it once in our lives and believe it is a strong problem in our world

Although we could've done better this is what our current product is , hope you enjoy
